mapper.sql: t.id as id, t.post as post, t.title as title, t.appreciable as appreciable, t.approve_cnt as approveCnt, t.author_id as authorId, t.commented as commented, t.reprinted as reprinted, t.content as content, t.cover as cover, t.draft as draft, t.md_content as mdContent, t.modify_time as modifyTime, t.summary as summary, t.text_content as textContent, t.top as top, t.url_seq as urlSeq, t.views as views
mapper.select: select sum(case when text_content is null then 0 else length(text_content) end) from nb_article

select * from( select
from nb_article t WHERE t.draft = 0 ORDER BY dbms_random.value ) where rownum <= #{rownu}

select * from nb_article a where a.draft !=1
and a.title like '%'+||#{title}||+'%' ;
